statements: This is the crew area of the ship.  Unauthorized persons aren't supposed to come through here, so be careful.
The med bay might have some supplies if you find yourself injured.  Or you might just get more injured!
I've also heard that the Captain left something valuable behind; hopefully you'll know it when you see it.
Anyway.  Get the Captain's keycard - he likely went down with the ship. We'll need that for access to further areas.  Good luck.
